gui.analyzer.util

Class ComponentFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.analyzer.util.ComponentFinder

  • public class ComponentFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Offers different methods for searching in the component tree. The class implements the singleton pattern. obtaining a scene containing the given component, from the given list of scenes obtaining a component path for the given component searching a component in a tree according to various parameters transformation of component tree to a list of components

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ComponentFinder getInstance()
        Returns:
        ComponentFinder singleton instance.

      • getSceneContainerAsComponent

        public java.awt.Component getSceneContainerAsComponent(Scene<?> scene)
        Each Scene contains a reference to the scene container, which is of type Object by default. This method selects the sceneContainer, which is of type Object by default, and if it is of type Component, then returns the sceneContainer as Component. If it is null or the sceneContainer is not of type Component, returns null.
        Parameters:
        scene - a scene to select the sceneContainer from.
        Returns:
        The sceneContainer of type Component, if there is such, null otherwise.

      • getSceneContainingComponent

        public Scene<?> getSceneContainingComponent(java.util.List<Scene<?>> scenes,
                                   java.lang.Object component)
        Finds a scene, which contains the given component.
        Parameters:
        scenes - a list of all scenes where the component should be searched in.
        component - the component which should be found in a scene.
        Returns:
        a scene from the list of scenes which contains the given component.

      • getComponentFromPath

        public java.awt.Component getComponentFromPath(Scene<?> scene,
                                      ComponentPath componentPath)
        Gets the component for the given component path.
        Parameters:
        scene - the scene to search the component for in
        componentPath - the path to the component
        Returns:
        the component located in the given scene on the given component path

      • getPathForComponent

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getPathForComponent(Scene<?> scene,
                                                    java.awt.Component component)
        Returns the path to the given component in the given scene.
        Parameters:
        scene - the scene the component is located in
        component - the component, for which the component path should be created
        Returns:
        the path to the given component in the given scene as a list of integers

        Returns:
